description: The goal is to hire a contractor for the repair and maintenance for different types of file bays in Edmonton, Alberta. Bidding open till 2 PM on 14, March 2023. The contract will be from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024.
duration_in_months: 12.5 years yet since close of contract date is March 31st and start date is an estimated April 1st based on usual annual bidding round proceedings
tags: Contract Duration 1 Year with Optional Extension
